author: mandrenguyen
body:
Vtx smearing parameters are updated to match 5 TeV and 8 TeV beamspots measured by @jrcastle 
The pixel barycenter shift between data and MC is taken into account. 
Variants of the vtx smearing that also boost the center-of-mass to do asymmetric collisions in MC are updated as well. 
This PR will be backported to 80X.  Should I also put it in 81X?
title: pA vertex smearing update to match measured beamspots
